venue.name: United South End Settlement (Harriet Tubman House)

item.description:
Hello, how are you? 

 

This is a brand new, hands on volunteer opportunity. 

Many Bostonians want to better themselves. Many people never had the same opportunities as you and I. 

We will be teaching Bostonians basic English and Math skills. Helping them prepare for and pass their GEDs. Helping them better their lives. 

This lives by our philosophy "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."

It is something that I am very passionate about. 

We will be helping these Bostonians once a month on the Third Thursday. 

 

After this event we will often walk to a nearby popular restaurant - You will meet new people who share your values. 

 

I anticipate volunteering with you, :)

Josh

 

P.S. I will not be able to lead this event monthly. Do you live near the South End? I could use your help. Can you lead this event occasionally? Please email me. 

 

P.P.S. Connect with everybody else: http://on.FB.me/fEGBoo

Follow us: @BostonVolunteer
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the HUGE group standing next to the door. Almost everybody here will be with us. :)

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Helping Bostonians Learn. Hands on Volunteering + Social Fun...
